TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
Because sneaking around in a 100 ton + crawler is easier with a distraction, apparently.

Also, +1 for "Did someone order a large ham?"

Please. Stop. My sides ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Also, +1 for "Did someone order a large ham?"
> Please. Stop. My sides ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) From the Tropes [page on the subject:](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/LARGEHAM)

![large-ham2_2840.jpg](http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/large-ham2_2840.jpg)

NOOOO!

Now I need to wait to see what happens again. 

And lol my 1,000th post here.
Yay! I did survive falling from orbit, but sometimes I've jumped just a couple meters, and crashed the game/froze up my kerbal.
Next chapter: Grand Theft Rocket ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Go brave Kerbals! Be free! And down with Mort!

Personally, I loved Jeb's Shakespeareian hammery. (hamminess?, hammishness?, hamfoolery?)

Unlike that picture of poor Will. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy landings!
Jeb's Hamlet speech just made me laugh real loud at work and now my coleagues think I'm crazy...
Y'know, I could donate a CF-86 Sabrejet...... Six .50 cal turrets do make a nasty mess of a building.......Just saying'!

Lisa: it looks like you are going to blow up the admin building!

Bill: well... In that case it's exactly what it looks like!

> 
> Lisa: it looks like you are going to blow up the admin building!
> Bill: well... In that case it's exactly what it looks like!

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Can we do it? Pretty please?

> 
> ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Can we do it? Pretty please?

I did consider having Jeb crash a plane (after ejecting, of course) into the admin building as his distraction--decided this would be easier, funnier, and in keeping with my pacifist Kerbalverse ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

yay you mentioned my comment ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-09T23:36:20Z" title="09/09/2015 11:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 9, 2015</time> by EdusacconBR**
Good plan Bill!

![3tLJnuh.png](http://i.imgur.com/3tLJnuh.png)

![bt0r3VR.png](http://i.imgur.com/bt0r3VR.png)
Aww, so no rebel moment? Bah.
Hmm... but weren't lisa and val there when bill announced a plan? why rat him out? unless... the m7 was already stolen... and set up in a remote launch location where mort can't see it!
Anty Kerman? Anti...Kerman? Does that mean her rockets don't explode, or something? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
So does this mean that Bob and Tedus will be able to banter more?

Ok, that thing has only basic jets, it can't even make a suborbital trip.

So, is Val going to hijack the ship Mort wants to launch on her own?

And is "Order Zero" "No Kerbal left behind"?
Ugh.....tourists.....especially whiny tourists.......ugh.
What type of stock contract needs a suborbital craft?

The last panel says it all.

Gloom! Doom! The dark side has completely taken over. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

And a tourist run?! How much worse can it get?

I can only hope that our heroes' next plan is more successful than Bill's attempt to borrow some rocket parts.

Happy landings!

Well, lets look on the bright side of this mission:

3 tourists. Easy to control.

Now, Jeb and Bill could be flying this, have up to 144 tourists, all complaining, and NO FLIGHT ATTENDANTS!!

![screenshot66_2.png](http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e216/Max_Payne_0001/screenshot66_2.png)

THAT would suck.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-10T15:39:45Z" title="09/10/2015 03:39  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 10, 2015</time> by GDJ**

I gotta wonder whether this is all part of the plan... Who would ever suspect that Val and Lisa are in on it now that they "exposed" Bill's attempt?

Edit: Oh, and the tourists are just perfect ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Up until now, I thought the Billmobile/Mortingale was the payload of the M7, but looking [back a couple of pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128879-Eve-Order-Zero-a-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28CH4-Pg15-Fly-the-Jeb-ly-skies!%29?p=2181655&viewfull=1#post2181655), I realise I wasn't paying enough attention and they are two completely different craft. Are we allowed to know what modifications were made from Bill's original design?

> 
> Up until now, I thought the Billmobile/Mortingale was the payload of the M7, but looking [back a couple of pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128879-Eve-Order-Zero-a-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28CH4-Pg15-Fly-the-Jeb-ly-skies!%29?p=2181655&viewfull=1#post2181655), I realise I wasn't paying enough attention and they are two completely different craft. Are we allowed to know what modifications were made from Bill's original design?

Sorry, this wasn't clear. "Billmobile" refers to the surface craft that Val's ship will deliver to Eve. "Mortingale" refers to the payload as well as the delivery ship. I suppose when they drop it off they'll call it "Mortingale Rover" of "Fundyfunfun" or something.

And nope :/
